meanings.definition: The ability to be crossed or interbred.
meanings.sent1: The farmer studied the crossabilities of different plant species.
meanings.sent2: Geneticists are interested in the crossabilities of various animal breeds.
meanings.sent3: The crossabilities of the flowers led to a beautiful garden mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The crossabilities of these two dog breeds resulted in unique puppies.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the crossabilities of different fish species is crucial for aquaculture.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be crossed or interbred.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching the crossabilities of different types of insects.
meanings.sent2: The crossabilities of certain flower varieties allow for new hybrids.
meanings.sent3: The crossabilities of these plants make them the talk of the botanical world.
meanings.sent4: The crossabilities of these two bird species create a harmonious ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the crossabilities of various tree species can lead to exciting discoveries.
